title: Frieze, 1890–1900
medium: Block-printed with flock and mica, embossed
description: b) Three vertical stripes to be cut into three friezes. Field tobacco brown flock. Design leaf scroll in gold with flock black outlines in parts. Both edges of each stripe have gold and black bands. Design embossed; a) Same design on darker brown flock field, design in copper bronze and gold mica used in small medallions on borders and dark red flock outlines around leaf design. This piece has been cut into one stripe. Design embossed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Frieze, 1890–1900.
1890–1900. Block-printed with flock and mica, embossed. Gift of Robina Clark. 1939-33-53-a,b.
